translation.en: Are we spinning yet? All right, nice.
Now you never call me no more.
Now, come on, what is that? Where's the love, huh?
translation.fr: Putain, quoi ! Et l'amour dans tout ça ?

translation.en: Because I have to guess that maybe you're feeling like shit right about now?
translation.fr: Parce que j'ai l'impression que t'en chies, non ?

translation.en: You can't move too good. Huh? You can't breathe too good.
translation.fr: T'as des difficultés à bouger. Tu galères à respirer.

translation.en: What the hell is the matter with you, dude? [laughs]
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui va pas chez toi, mec ?

translation.en: Can you guess what this is?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que c'est, ça ?

translation.en: Oh, this is plain sick, man!
I must be the motherfucking genius of sick, you know?
translation.fr: Je dois être un putain de génie des trucs de tordus !

translation.en: Poison Chev Chelios in his sleep?
That's like some Shakespeare or some shit.
translation.fr: On dirait du Shakespeare ou une merde du style.

translation.en: Whoo! Damn, you knocked this dude out pretty good.
translation.fr: Putain, tu l'as mis KO, le type.

translation.en: About to get you a spot on the Dodgers, son. Yeah.
translation.fr: T'as ta place chez les Dodgers, mon pote.

translation.en: Maybe you don't understand what just happened.
translation.fr: Tu piges peut-être pas ce qui t'est arrivé.

translation.en: You try not to embarrass yourself because you're on Candid Camera!
translation.fr: Te donne pas en spectacle, parce que t'es filmé !

translation.en: Ohh! What is this shit right here I gave you?
translation.fr: C'est quoi ce truc que je t'ai filé ?

translation.en: This is some high-tech, sci-fi, Chinese [whoops] synthetic bullshit!
translation.fr: Une merde de synthèse chinoise high-tech !

translation.en: I don't exactly know what the fuck is in this shit, dude.
translation.fr: Je sais pas trop ce qu'il y a dans ce truc, mec.

translation.en: All I know is that, once this shit has binded with your blood cells…
translation.fr: Tout ce que je sais, c'est qu'une fois que ça se fout sur tes globules…

translation.en: You're fucked, baby, and believe me, it's done binded.
translation.fr: t'es foutu, mec, c'est déjà dans ton sang.

translation.en: Yeah, you got yourself about an hour, max.
translation.fr: T'en as pour une heure, max.

translation.en: You probably should've thought twice before you whacked Don Kim.
translation.fr: T'aurais dû réfléchir avant de te faire Don Kim.

translation.en: You're experiencing a little 20/20 hindsight right about now, ain't you?
translation.fr: Tu vois mieux de quoi il s'agit, là ?
C'est bien ce que je pensais.

translation.en: Now you have yourself a nice death.
translation.fr: Je te souhaite une belle mort.

translation.en: You like that, huh? Home run.
translation.fr: Ça t'a plu ? En plein dans le mille.

translation.en: I'm glad you called, but I'm not here.
translation.fr: Merci pour votre appel, mais je suis pas là.

translation.en: Uh, can you leave a message?
Unless you're trying to sell something, because I'm not interested, but…
translation.fr: Si c'est pour me vendre un truc, ça m'intéresse pas, mais…

translation.en: If you're not, then just… Oh! Wait.
translation.fr: si c'est pas le cas, alors… Mince !

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on.
Dr. Miles' office. May I help you?
Yeah, let me speak to him.
I'm sorry, but the doctor isn't in right now.
translation.fr: Le docteur n'est pas là pour le moment.
Où est-il ? Je vous demande pardon ?

translation.en: This is his answering service. Jesus fucking Christ.
translation.fr: - J'assure la permanence téléphonique. - Bordel de merde.

translation.en: Would you like for me to have him paged?
Could you please let the doctor know that Chev Chelios is a dead man
translation.fr: Pouvez-vous dire au docteur que Chev Chelios est un homme mort

translation.en: if he can't call me back within the hour. You got that?
translation.fr: s'il me rappelle pas dans l'heure ? Compris ?

translation.en: Could you spell that for me?
I said, where were you last night?
Yeah, yeah, well, you want to know what I was doing?
translation.fr: Tu veux savoir ce que je faisais, moi ?
- Quoi ? - Je me faisais tuer, crétin.
Ricky Verona de mes deux. - Ricky Verona ? - Qui aurait cru

translation.en: That little bitch would have the stones to come and whack me in my own crib.
translation.fr: que cette chienne aurait les couilles de venir me buter chez moi.

translation.en: And yet, here we are. Where are we?

translation.fr: Je suis foutu, et t'es simplet.

translation.en: You put the word out I'm looking for Ricky Verona.
translation.fr: Fais passer le mot que je cherche Ricky Verona.

translation.en: Anyone sees him, you call me. -You understand that? -I…
translation.fr: Appelle-moi si quelqu'un le voit, compris ?

translation.en: I'm going to get that little fucker if it's the last thing I do.
translation.fr: Je vais le buter, ce petit enfoiré, même si j'en crève.

translation.en: It may actually be the last thing I do.
What the fuck you doing? Where am I going?
Man, the bathroom don't work, brother. What you doing?
Yo, Chevy, what the-- Where's Verona?
translation.fr: - Chev, qu'est-ce que… - Où est Verona ?

translation.en: I'm talking. What are we talking about? Don't fuck with me!
translation.fr: - De quoi tu parles ? - Te fous pas de moi !

translation.en: Ok, man. Nobody's fucking with you, man. Just calm down.
translation.fr: Du calme, mec ! Personne se fout de toi.

translation.en: Don't tell me to calm down, motherfucker! -Fuck, man! -[banging on door]
translation.fr: - Je suis calme, enfoiré ! - Sans déconner, mec !

translation.en: Hey! There's a white nigga with a gun up in here.
translation.fr: Y a un frère blanc avec un flingue ici.

translation.en: So just, just be still, motherfuckers!
Now, you see that? You see that?
I'm trying to help you here, man.
Look, I got to find Ricky Verona.
Why the fuck would I know where Ricky Verona is?
translation.fr: Pourquoi je saurais où il est ?
Pourquoi je saurais où il est ? Ouais, c'est ça.

translation.en: Don't know where he is, but you're going to tell me where he is.
translation.fr: Tu sais pas où il est, mais tu vas me le dire.

translation.en: Or I'm going to blow your brains through the fucking toilet!
translation.fr: Ou je t'explose la cervelle dans le chiotte !

translation.en: Come on, man! I'm going to kill him!
translation.fr: - Putain, mec ! - Je vais le buter !

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Put your guns down. The white man is cool.
translation.fr: Baissez vos flingues. Ce blanc est tranquille.

translation.en: Hey! The white man is-- The white man is cool!
translation.fr: Hé ! Il est tranquille, je vous dis !

translation.en: Now, look, Chevy came here because he has something he would like to discuss.
translation.fr: Chevy est venu ici pour discuter.

translation.en: And we going to discuss this shit in a civilized manner.
translation.fr: Et donc, on va causer comme des gens civilisés.

translation.en: Chevy? I believe you had a question,
or some point that you were trying to make.
I'm not affiliated with Ricky Verona.
translation.fr: Je suis pas associé à Ricky Verona.

translation.en: You pulled the Anselmo job together.
-Don't try to fucking bullshit me! -[all yelling]
translation.fr: Te fous pas de ma gueule !

translation.en: Look, clearly you're operating under a false pretense, all right?
Because Ricky Verona and myself did not pull the Anselmo job together.
translation.fr: Parce que Ricky Verona et moi, on a pas bossé ensemble.

translation.en: In fact, Ricky Verona fucked me on the Anselmo job.
In fact, Ricky Verona still owes me $7,500.
Not the way I heard it. Yeah, but that's the way it is.
translation.fr: - C'est pas ce qu'on dit. - Pourtant, c'est la vérité.

translation.en: That's the way it is. So, you see, I don't know where Ricky Verona is
translation.fr: Donc, je sais pas où se trouve Ricky Verona.

translation.en: because if I knew where Ricky Verona was
translation.fr: Donc, je sais pas où se trouve Ricky Verona. Si je le savais, je serais déjà en train de lui botter son cul plein aux as.

translation.en: I'd probably be there right now, beating the Gucci off his ass.
translation.fr: Si je le savais, je serais déjà en train de lui botter son cul plein aux as.
Là, on est des gens civilisés.

translation.en: Shit, dude, what's the matter with you?
translation.fr: Putain, mec, c'est quoi ton problème ?

translation.en: Just give me some coke, ok? You got any coke?
translation.fr: File-moi un peu de coke. T'en as ?

translation.en: Okay, so now you're just gonna come up in here and insult me.
translation.fr: Tu débarques comme ça et tu m'insultes.

translation.en: Come on, I don't have time!
translation.fr: Il me reste pas beaucoup de temps !

translation.en: I'm really dying here. I can see that.
translation.fr: - Je suis en train de crever. - Je vois ça.

translation.en: You don't understand. I'm really fucking dying!
translation.fr: Tu piges rien. Je crève pour de vrai !

translation.en: You saying this is medicinal-use coke? Is that what you're saying?
translation.fr: Pour un usage thérapeutique ? C'est ça que tu veux dire ?

translation.en: What, you going to do the shit right here?
Oh, that's good. Oh, that's good.
Why you looking for Verona anyway, man?
Seems like some Chinese assholes hired him to kill me.
translation.fr: Des enfoirés de Chinois l'ont engagé pour me buter.

translation.en: So this is about the Don Kim situation.
What do you know about it?
translation.fr: Tu sais quoi à ce sujet ?

translation.en: I know you pulled the trigger.
Of course I pulled the trigger.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que je l'ai fumé.

translation.en: Why wouldn't I pull the fucking trigger?

translation.fr: Yo, Chelios. Tu te sens bien ?
Ça me fait rien cette merde.

translation.en: I think I know what I have to do.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que je vais faire.

translation.en: A man's got to do what a man's got to do.
translation.fr: Fais ce que t'as à faire.

translation.en: What is it you got to do?
I got to kick some Black ass.
Why ain't you dead yet, man? What the fuck you doing out there?
translation.fr: T'es pas encore mort ? Qu'est-ce que tu fous ?

translation.en: Coming for you, asshole, fucking believe me!
translation.fr: Je viens te retrouver, connard, crois-moi !

translation.en: Yo, whatever, dude. I'll be waiting for you.
translation.fr: Comme tu veux, mec. Je t'attends.

translation.en: You ain't going to make it, though, motherfucker.
Look, I just thought you should know that I'm all about hooking up
translation.fr: Saches que je suis sur le point de serrer

translation.en: with that little mystery girl that you been banging.
translation.fr: la nana que tu te tapes en secret.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I know about that shit.
Soon as your ass is underground.
I forgot to say so on that gay James Bond tape I left for you.
translation.fr: J'avais oublié de te le dire sur la K7 à la James Bond que je t'ai laissée.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. What, and then you're gonna rape my grandmother?
translation.fr: Ouais, c'est ça. Tu vas violer ma grand-mère aussi ?
Tout ça, c'est du bla bla.

translation.en: Now listen to me, you little mug.
What do you think Carlito's gonna do when he finds out what you did? Huh?
translation.fr: Que va faire Carlito quand il apprendra ce que t'as fait ?
Ta bande et toi, vous êtes morts.

translation.en: [Officer over PA] Driver, pull over! Fuck! Great.
'cause me and Carlito, man, we're boys now.
translation.fr: parce que Carlito et moi, on est potes.

translation.en: [Chelios] You haven't been tight since your brother fucked you in third grade.
translation.fr: Pas depuis que ton frère t'a baisé en primaire.

translation.en: But I did you pretty good, though, didn't I, Chelios?
translation.fr: Moi en tout cas, je t'ai pas mal baisé, Chelios.

translation.en: -You know what the best part about it is? -[beeping]

translation.fr: Désolé, je te dois te laisser. Bye bye !

translation.en: Fuck for that, Doc. What took you so long?
Jesus Christ. I'm sorry, Chevy. I just got the message.
translation.fr: Désolé, Chevy. Je viens d'avoir ton message.

translation.en: Ok, ok, ok, forget it. Listen. I'm dying.
translation.fr: Laisse tomber. Écoute, je suis en train de crever.

translation.en: I've been poisoned with some kind of Chinese synthetic shit.
translation.fr: J'ai été empoisonné par un truc qui vient de Chine.

translation.en: What? Yeah, you got to fucking do something for me, Doc.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Il faut que tu m'aides, Doc.

translation.en: -I'm telling you now. -What are your symptoms?
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Il faut que tu m'aides, Doc. Quels symptômes ?

translation.en: It's like, uh, like I'm slowing down. You know, I'm caught in a tar pit.
translation.fr: J'avance au ralenti, comme dans un bourbier.

translation.en: Actually, I'm feeling pretty good right now.
translation.fr: En fait, je me sens plutôt bien.

translation.en: Driving through a mall. Cops chasing me.
translation.fr: Je roule. J'ai les flics au cul.

translation.en: The flow of adrenaline's what's keeping you alive.
translation.fr: C'est l'adrénaline qui te tient en vie.

translation.en: I'm having a little trouble hearing you, Doc.
translation.fr: J'ai un peu de mal à t'entendre, Doc.

translation.en: You got to keep moving, Chevy.
If I'm right, they gave you the Beijing cocktail.
translation.fr: Si c'est ce que je pense, ils t'ont injecté le cocktail Pékin.

translation.en: It works on the adrenal gland, blocks its receptors.
translation.fr: Ça bloque les récepteurs de la glande surrénale.

translation.en: In fact, the only thing you can do to slow it down at all
translation.fr: Le seul moyen de ralentir les effets,

translation.en: is to keep the flow of adrenaline constant.
translation.fr: c'est de rester en montée d'adrénaline.

translation.en: -Meaning, if you stop, you die. -Hang on.
translation.fr: En gros, tu t'arrêtes, tu y restes. Quitte pas.

translation.en: That's what I'm trying to do.
translation.fr: C'est ce que j'essaie de faire.

translation.en: Every time I slow down, it's, uh…
It's like my veins start to rust.
A couple of grams of coke.
Well, that's a start, huh, Chevy?
translation.fr: OK, c'est un bon début. Chevy ?

translation.en: Look, I'll be in L.A. In about an hour.
translation.fr: Dans une heure, je suis à L.A.

translation.en: I'll call you as soon as I get there, but do not stop moving.
translation.fr: Je t'appelle dès que j'arrive. Continue de bouger.

translation.en: Where do you want to go, man? Right.
translation.fr: - Où vous voulez aller ? - À droite.

translation.en: Don't go anywhere. I'll be back in one minute.
translation.fr: Bougez pas. J'en ai pour une minute.

translation.en: Hey, this is Eve. I'm glad you called…
translation.fr: Salut, c'est Eve. Merci pour votre appel…

translation.en: Where do you want to go, man?
Listen, Carlito. I need your help.
translation.fr: Carlito, j'ai besoin de ton aide.

translation.en: I don't have a lot of time. No.
translation.fr: J'ai pas beaucoup de temps devant moi.

translation.en: You got to find an antidote, something.
translation.fr: Il faut que tu me trouves un antidote.

translation.en: Honestly… you should be dead already.
translation.fr: Tu devrais être mort à l'heure qu'il est.

translation.en: We give that shit to horses.
translation.fr: C'est ce qu'on file aux canassons.

translation.en: You don't have to be so damn fucking cool about it!
translation.fr: Y a pas de quoi se marrer !

translation.en: What do you expect me to do, hmm?
Tell me you're going to find that punk Verona
translation.fr: Trouve-moi ce petit con de Verona

translation.en: and feed him to a cage of wolverines.
translation.fr: pour les filer à bouffer aux carcajous.

translation.en: What, are you boys now or something?
But that's not to say there isn't an opportunity here.
Everyone knows the love I have for you, Chev.
translation.fr: Tout le monde sait que je t'apprécie, Chev.

translation.en: Maybe this makes up for the Don Kim hit, which was…
translation.fr: Peut-être que tu paies pour ce que t'as fait à Don Kim qui était…

translation.en: The heat from Hong Kong has been much more than we anticipated.
translation.fr: On pensait pas que la pression de Hong Kong serait si forte.

translation.en: I'm glad to know that my death can be of some fucking use to you.
translation.fr: Ravi que ma mort puisse t'être utile.

translation.en: Don't be difficult. I'm not being difficult.
translation.fr: - Ne complique pas les choses. - Je complique rien.

translation.en: I don't know if you'd noticed,
translation.fr: Je sais pas si t'as remarqué,

translation.en: but I'm having a difficult fucking day, brother!
translation.fr: mais ma journée est putain de compliquée !

translation.en: Ah, you're not getting in my cab wet.
translation.fr: Rentre pas dans mon taxi trempé !

translation.en: I just gave you $200 to wait for three minutes.
translation.fr: T'as eu 200 $ pour attendre trois minutes.

translation.en: You're not getting in my car. No way!
translation.fr: Tu rentres pas dans ma voiture.

translation.en: Yeah, you're right. I'm not getting in your cab.
translation.fr: Tu vas voir si je rentre pas dans ton taxi.

translation.en: [driver yelling] I love America! I love Bush!
Hey, Chev. My flight's been delayed.
Shit. No, no, it's all right. Relax.
I mean, don't relax. Listen to me.
That shit that they gave you is cutting off your adrenaline.
translation.fr: Cette saloperie qu'ils t'ont filée te coupe l'adrénaline.

translation.en: It causes your body to manufacture a chemical called ephedrine.
translation.fr: Ça crée une substance chimique qu'on appelle "éphédrine".

translation.en: Now, what these guys have done is introduce an inhibitor to your system.
translation.fr: Ces types t'ont introduit un inhibiteur.

translation.en: Dude, your only chance is to massively increase
translation.fr: Pour t'en sortir, il faut faire grimper

translation.en: the level of ephedrine in your body to force out the inhibitors.
translation.fr: ton niveau d'éphédrine pour expulser les inhibiteurs.

translation.en: You got to get to the emergency room. Get yourself some epinephrine.
translation.fr: Va aux urgences et procure-toi de l'épinéphrine.
Ce sont des seringues de 10 mg.

translation.en: The shit's potent, so don't overdo it.
translation.fr: Ce truc est puissant, donc vas-y mollo !

translation.en: Probably a fifth of an injection will do.
translation.fr: Un cinquième de seringue fera l'affaire.

translation.en: Ok, ok, ok, I've got it. I got to go.
I'll call you when I get there.
I just saw Verona's brother walk into The Prince.
translation.fr: Le frère de Verona vient d'entrer au Prince.

translation.en: Yeah. I was just down here getting a taco
translation.fr: J'allais me commander un tacos et il est entré au même moment.

translation.en: and he just walked right in. Two minutes ago.
translation.fr: J'allais me commander un tacos et il est entré au même moment. Il y a deux minutes.

translation.en: I'm across the street, getting a taco.
I'm there. Meet me on 7th and Catalina.
translation.fr: - T'es où ? - J'arrive. Rejoins-moi entre la 7e et Catalina.

translation.en: Did anyone go in with him?
How'd you like that one, tough guy?
How fricking awesome was that, huh?
You feel like talking to me, do you?
translation.fr: T'as envie de me parler, maintenant ?
Où est ton putain de frère ?

translation.en: Doing your mother like a fuckin' whore, you bitch!
translation.fr: Il se farcit ta mère, connard !

translation.en: Wonder how many steaks I could carve out of you.
translation.fr: Y a de quoi en faire des steaks sur toi.

translation.en: What, you rolling pin mighty good? ♪ I'm even on knees ♪
translation.fr: Tu vas faire quoi avec ton rouleau à pâtisserie ?

translation.en: What, you want to dance with me, motherfucker?
What do you think about sucking me off? You in the mood?
translation.fr: Me sucer jusqu'à la moelle, ça te dit ?

translation.en: Maybe let me lick your ass or something?
translation.fr: Ou bien je te lèche le trou de balle ?

translation.en: Want to guess how I got your brother's cell phone?
translation.fr: Comment j'ai eu son portable, d'après toi ?

translation.en: I can tell you have it all figured out.
Looks like you should have cut me up when you had the chance.
translation.fr: T'aurais peut-être dû me buter quand t'en avais l'occasion.

translation.en: I'm having a little trouble hearing you, Ricky.
translation.fr: Je t'entends pas très bien, Ricky.

translation.en: Are you experiencing a little 20/20 hindsight?
translation.fr: Tu vois mieux de quoi il s'agit ?

translation.en: You're supposed to be fucking dead!
You know, I kind of like that shit you put in me.
translation.fr: Elle me plaît bien ta dope.

translation.en: Can you get me some more?
translation.fr: T'en aurais pas un peu plus ?

translation.en: -I'm gonna f-- -Oh, I know. I know. I know.
translation.fr: - Putain, je vais te… - Je sais. Hé ! C'est quoi ça ?

translation.en: You guys really are faggots, aren't you?
translation.fr: De vrais pédés tous les deux, non ?
Enfoiré… Espèce de fils de pute !

translation.en: My grandfather gave that medallion to my father, and then he…
translation.fr: Mon père a eu ce médaillon de mon grand-père et…

translation.en: You take that thing and you shove it up your ass.
translation.fr: Tu peux te le carrer au cul.

translation.en: You know, I believe I'll hang on to it.
translation.fr: Je crois bien que je vais le garder.

translation.en: Looks like you'll have to come find me after all.
translation.fr: Je crois que tu vas devoir venir me trouver.

translation.en: Fucked up that you killed your own brother.
translation.fr: T'as buté ton propre frère, quel taré.

translation.en: I'm looking for something starts with "E."
translation.fr: Je cherche un truc qui commence par "é".
Je ne peux pas vous en vendre.

translation.en: Oy! What do you mean you--
What is this shit? Nasal spray.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ce bordel. - Du spray nasal.

translation.en: Nasal spray. It's got epinephrine in it.
translation.fr: Du spray nasal. Y a de l'épinéphrine dedans.

translation.en: -[Officer] Are you sure that's the guy? -[nurse] Yeah.
[woman over PA] Could anyone speaking Korean please come to E.R.?
translation.fr: Si quelqu'un parle le coréen, il est prié de se présenter aux urgences.

translation.en: Anyone speaking Korean please come to E.R.
translation.fr: Si quelqu'un parle le coréen, il est prié de se présenter aux urgences.

translation.en: I know you motherfuckers have epinephrine!
translation.fr: Je sais que vous avez de l'épinéphrine !

translation.en: I'm having a really bad day. Oh, shit!
translation.fr: - Je passe une sale journée. - Oh, putain !

translation.en: Tell me you've got epinephrine on this fucking cart.
translation.fr: T'as de l'épinéphrine sur ce chariot ?

translation.en: I said, "Tell me you've got epinephrine on the cart," motherfucker!
I don't know! I could check. All right. Ok.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas ! Je vais vérifier.

translation.en: You understand fucking English? I understand English.
translation.fr: - Tu comprends pas le français ? - Si.

translation.en: I just don't know which one of these drawers it's in.
translation.fr: - Tu comprends pas le français ? - Si. Je sais pas dans quel tiroir ça se trouve.
Donne-moi cette putain d'épinéphrine. Je sais pas où ça se trouve !

translation.en: I don't know where it is, man!
translation.fr: Je sais pas où ça se trouve !

translation.en: What is this, a rest home?
translation.fr: C'est une maison de repos ici ?

translation.en: What are you doing back there?
I don't know if I have it. Give me a second here. I'm looking.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si j'en ai, une seconde !

translation.en: What the fuck? Where the fuck is it?
do you think you're doing? This is a hospital.
translation.fr: Vous vous croyez où ? La ferme !

translation.en: Shut up. You! Get me the epinephrine.
translation.fr: Toi ! Va me chercher de l'épinéphrine.

translation.en: Epinephrine! Here it is. I got it.
I'm not gonna tell you again.
translation.fr: Je vais pas te le redire.
Très bien. J'ai pas toute la journée.

translation.en: Ok. I need both of them to…
translation.fr: Il faut que les deux soient…

translation.en: How much of this stuff did he say to take?
translation.fr: Il m'a dit d'en prendre quelle dose ?

translation.en: Hey, we're in the air, man.
Did you get that stuff I told you to get? Got it.
translation.fr: - Tu t'es procuré ce que je t'ai dit ? - Oui.

translation.en: You took the whole goddamn thing, didn't you?
translation.fr: Tu t'es tout enfilé, pas vrai ?

translation.en: -Yep. -I said a fifth of a syringe.

translation.fr: - Thorax qui brûle ? - Affirmatif. - Mais t'as froid ? - Affirmatif.

translation.en: And you got a steel hard-on, don't you?
that's the stimulation of your blood vessels.
Your urinary sphincter's as tight as a knot right now.
translation.fr: Ton urètre est tendu comme un string.

translation.en: You couldn't piss to save your life.
Maybe you can get some Vicodin. You still at that hospital?

translation.fr: Si je comprends bien, Mark, en plus des olives,

Let's just talk this over. Hey, you want it?

There's probably a psychopath heading over there to torture and kill you as we speak,

translation.en: but don't bother getting out of bed.
Maybe you can fry me up a waffle or something, ok?

translation.en: So let's go get the bitch.
Is this your new look or something?

translation.en: Are you looking for my other boyfriend?
You haven't turned on the TV today, right?

translation.en: Honey. Get dressed. Actually, I'm glad you're here.

translation.en: Can you change the clock on my microwave?

translation.en: and I never changed it back.
translation.fr: C'est l'heure d'été, et je l'ai jamais mis à l'heure.

translation.en: They got fucked up on the way over here.

translation.en: Are you ok? You look like you're on drugs or something.

I need you to put some clothes on, sweetheart, and come with me right now.

translation.en: I'll change the clock on the microwave. Ok.

translation.en: Do you want some pot or something?
It's all right. Burned my hand. Oh, my God! Let me see.

translation.en: The waffle thing. I got to turn it off.

I don't know what you're on these days, but it is not working for you.

translation.en: Ah, my hand cream. That's where you went.

translation.fr: Un peu d'aide serait la bienvenue, Chev.

translation.en: My car. Actually, I took a cab. A cab.
translation.fr: - En fait, j'ai pris un taxi. - Un taxi ?

translation.en: This isn't going to be easy, as they say.

translation.en: You know I told you I was a video game programmer.

translation.en: I freelance for a major West Coast crime syndicate.

translation.en: Last night was a job like 100 others.

translation.en: A high dollar hit, nothing special.
The Triads from Hong Kong had been moving in
on the local drug cartels for the last six months.
translation.fr: font du gringue aux cartels locaux depuis six mois.

translation.en: My target was their number one man in Los Angeles.

translation.fr: Et puis, sortie de nulle part,

translation.en: comes in through the back of my head

translation.en: like a .45 slug at close range.
translation.fr: comme une balle de .45 à bout portant.

translation.en: One hundred grand wants you dead,
so, sooner or later, it's gonna happen.

translation.en: Instead, you're gonna do something for me.

translation.en: You're gonna get out of town.
I don't care where you go. I don't care what you do,
translation.fr: Va où tu veux, fais ce que tu veux. Rien à foutre.

translation.en: so long as you're invisible for 48 hours.
translation.fr: Va où tu veux, fais ce que tu veux. Rien à foutre. Du moment que tu disparais 48 heures.
C'est tout ce que je demande.

translation.en: we can do it the other way.
The way where I go to work…
I quit the business. For you.
I figure I call you that night,
translation.fr: Je voulais t'appeler et tout te dire.
Je voulais t'appeler et tout te dire. Tu comprends ?

translation.en: We get on a plane together
and leave all this shit behind.

translation.en: Never come back. Pretty crazy, huh?

translation.en: So, are we going on a trip?
I might be going on a trip, but you're not coming with me.

translation.en: Do you know how ridiculous you sound?
If you're going to break up with me, at least you can tell me the truth.

translation.en: Wait a minute. Do you trust me? No.
Come on, I think it'll help. Help what? Are you kidding?
translation.fr: - Viens, ça peut m'aider. - T'aider ? Tu te fous moi ?

translation.en: You always say you want to be more spontaneous.

translation.en: You're like an adrenaline junkie with no soul.

Oh, my God, are you ok? Are you ok?
Get off! Get off! Get off! Aah! Aah!

Entre la 5e et Alameda ? Qui est là-bas ?

translation.en: You don't let that motherfucker out of your sight.

translation.en: You hear me? With you in ten minutes. You got it?

translation.en: Listen, honey, I got to go.
Oh, God, what are you looking at?
Hey, man, what's the matter with you?
translation.fr: Hé, mec ! Tu roules au crack, ou quoi ?
Hé, mec ! Tu roules au crack, ou quoi ? CRACK ?

translation.en: Right. Just step on it, all right?
You not going to die in my cab, crackhead.

translation.en: You take this Haitian shit, crackhead.
This shit right here is some hardcore shit.

translation.fr: Ça vient direct de la plante. DIRECT DE LA PLANTE

translation.en: Hey, what are you laughing at?
Look at this. You see that?
That's what a man look like, crackhead.
translation.fr: C'est à ça que ressemble un homme.
Ça a le goût de la merde.

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! No! No!
What'd you say was in this stuff?
translation.fr: T'as dit qu'y avait quoi dedans ?

translation.en: How the fuck you going to call me, talking shit, homey, huh?

translation.en: I'll smack the hell out of you.
I don't know where he at. I ain't babysitting the motherfucker.
translation.fr: Je sais pas ce qu'il fout. Je suis pas sa nounou.
Mais comment il me parle, ce connard.

translation.en: I'm doing my job! I'm doing my shit!
I'm out here just chilling, doing what I do.

translation.en: Hey, whoa, Chevy, Chevy, what's up, dog?

translation.en: Everything all right? You chilling? You good?
What you talking about, man? What are you doing? Waiting for a bus?

translation.en: Nah, nah, actually, I thought maybe a helicopter'd come pick--

translation.en: What, are you working for the Chinese now?
The Chinese? Come on, man, you crazy?
You know I wouldn't do that to you, man. I am crazy. Where's Kaylo?

translation.en: What you mean, ding? What you mean, ding?
Now you tell me where that little
translation.fr: Maintenant, tu vas me dire où se trouve cette chiure de mes deux.
Maintenant, tu vas me dire où se trouve cette chiure de mes deux. - Verona. - Verona n'a rien à voir là-dedans.

translation.en: Verona's got nothing to do with this.
translation.fr: - Verona. - Verona n'a rien à voir là-dedans.

translation.en: Don Carlos wants you off the streets.
translation.fr: Don Carlos veut que tu disparaisses.

translation.en: You've totally lost your shit, dog.

translation.fr: Tu saccages des bâtiments, tu liquides sans contrat.

translation.en: You're causing the organization a great deal of embarrassment.
You're telling me Carlito ordered this?
translation.fr: C'est Carlito qui est derrière tout ça ?

translation.en: Look, don't worry about Verona. We'll take care of him.

translation.en: The best thing for you to do is find some nice, dark, quiet place, and…
translation.fr: Je te conseille un truc, c'est de te trouver un coin peinard et…

translation.en: Do you think I've got "cunt" written on my forehead?
We all got to die sometime, right?

translation.en: We all got to die sometime.
translation.fr: On va tous crever un jour.

translation.en: Oh, my fucking ass! You got shot!
You! Asshole! What you want? Don't talk to him like that!
translation.fr: - Connard ! Tu veux quoi ? - Changez de ton !

translation.en: I had to see if you were telling the truth.
translation.fr: Je voulais voir si tu disais la vérité.

translation.en: I forgot to take my birth control pills.
translation.fr: J'ai oublié de prendre ma pilule.

translation.en: Come on, come on! My stuff!
You weren't lying. Welcome to my life.

translation.en: that you would give it all up for me.

translation.en: The poison? Yeah, that's true, too.

translation.fr: C'est à peu près ça, Eve.

translation.en: Adrenaline's the only thing that slows it down.

translation.en: So, when we were in Chinatown?
translation.fr: Alors, quand on était à Chinatown…

translation.en: Eve, what are you doing? This'll get you going.

Oh, that's really working for me.
translation.fr: Ça me va comme idée. RALENTISSEZ
- T'aime ça ? - Garde la tête en bas !
Oh, putain ! Ouais, c'est ça, bébé.
Garde la tête en bas, Eve.

translation.en: So you can fall asleep like you always do?
I told you, baby. I quit.
Chev. Holy shit, I've been trying to get a hold of you for half an hour.
translation.fr: Bordel, ça fait une demi-heure que j'essaie de te joindre.

translation.en: Where the fuck have you been?
At my office. Can you make it over here?
translation.fr: - Où t'étais, putain ? - Au cabinet. - Tu peux venir jusqu'ici ? - Oui. Pourquoi pas !
- Tu peux venir jusqu'ici ? - Oui. Pourquoi pas !

translation.en: What's this fucking receipt from Gold Foods Market for $254?
translation.fr: C'est quoi ce putain de ticket de caisse de supermarché de 254 $ ?
Chevy, t'es le plus fidèle de mes patients.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I got a little meth in there, too,
translation.fr: Bon, j'y ai ajouté un peu d'amphét',

translation.en: so that's the endorphins you feel running to your brain.
translation.fr: ce sont les endorphines qui te montent au cerveau.

translation.en: Wait a minute. So I'm not better?
translation.fr: Attends un peu. Je vais pas mieux ?
Que dalle, tu vas pas mieux.

translation.en: You're in such shit shape, it's stunning.
I can't believe your heart's still beating.
translation.fr: Je comprends pas que ton cœur batte encore.

translation.en: Shit should be in a fucking medical journal.
translation.fr: Un miracle pareil mérite la une des revues médicales.

translation.en: So what are you going to do?
The solution I'm giving you is acting as a competing inhibitor,
translation.fr: La solution que je t'injecte va combattre l'inhibiteur.

translation.en: meaning that it's pushing the poison right out of your receptors
translation.fr: En gros, ça chasse le poison des récepteurs

translation.en: and replacing it with a chemical.
translation.fr: et le remplace par une substance.

translation.en: Now, that's just a temporary fix.
I could put you on life-support, Chev, and string this out for a few days.
translation.fr: Je pourrais te mettre sous assistance quelques jours,

translation.en: But you're gonna go into a coma at some point.
translation.fr: mais tu finiras par tomber dans le coma.

translation.en: Why don't you let me load you up with something?
translation.fr: Tu veux pas que je te shoote ?

translation.en: You can go out in a beautiful dream.
translation.fr: De quoi faire de beaux rêves.

translation.en: Can I do that for you?
translation.fr: Je peux faire ça pour toi ?
C'est pas ce que je veux.

translation.en: [Reporter] And so, the wild rampage that began at 9:00 a.m.
translation.fr: L'équipée sauvage qui a débuté à 9 h du matin

translation.en: this morning in west Los Angeles continues
translation.fr: à l'ouest de la ville continue.

translation.en: with the mysterious suspect still at large.
translation.fr: Le mystérieux auteur est toujours en cavale.

translation.en: Yo, maybe we should have given him more of that Chinese shit.
translation.fr: On aurait dû lui filer plus de cette merde chinoise.

translation.en: I thought you might be interested in a little deal.
Are you a dealer? Is that what you are now?
translation.fr: Oh, t'es un dealer maintenant ? - Tu fais dans la came ? - T'occupe pas de moi.

translation.en: Don't you worry about what I am.
translation.fr: - Tu fais dans la came ? - T'occupe pas de moi.

translation.en: What are you prepared to give me, asshole?

translation.en: How about the jewelry I got off that faggot brother of yours,
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu dis du bijou de ton pédé de frangin,

translation.en: Don't pop a blood vessel, you little penis.
translation.fr: Te pète pas un vaisseau, petite bite.

translation.en: Oh, you like that deal, do you? Yeah, whatever.

translation.en: I'll be at the Downtown Lint in 20 minutes.
You know the spot? Yeah, I know it.
or I'll trade this thing to some whore

translation.en: Look, I said I'll fuckin' be--
translation.fr: Putain, je viens de te dire…
- À plus, mon ange. - Éteins-moi ça…

translation.en: You're not going to believe this call I just got.
translation.fr: Tu vas jamais croire qui j'ai eu au tel.

translation.en: [Chelios] It's gonna be all right, baby.
I can make a deal for it, but I got to go alone.
translation.fr: J'ai un échange à faire, mais je dois y aller seul.

translation.en: [woman's voice] Where did I go wrong?
Did you fucking just say something?
translation.fr: Tu viens de dire un truc ?

translation.en: [with woman's voice] It's like talking to the wall.
translation.fr: On dirait que je parle à un mur.

translation.en: I'm amazed you remember you have a mother.
translation.fr: Tu te souviens que t'as une mère, je suis épatée.

translation.en: Mom, please. I haven't got time for this.
translation.fr: Maman, s'il te plaît. J'ai pas le temps, là.

translation.en: [Orlando's voice] You got no time, period.
translation.fr: T'as pas le temps. Point barre.

translation.en: You a persistent motherfucker, Chev Chelios.
translation.fr: T'es un sacré coriace, Chev Chelios.

translation.en: They pop you and you just keep getting up?
translation.fr: Ils te plombent, et tu te relèves ?

translation.en: [Verona's voice] You was that, maybe, but there's a new gun in town.
translation.fr: C'était peut-être le cas, mais la relève est assurée.

translation.en: You know, I don't get it.
Why didn't you just cut me up alive when you had the chance?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ne pas m'avoir buté quand t'en as eu l'occasion ?

translation.en: Too easy, motherfucker. Look at you.
[Chelios's voice] Adrenaline junkie. Addicted to violence.
translation.fr: Camé à l'adrénaline, accro à la violence…

translation.en: Carving up a guy like that
while he screams in his own blood and excrement.
translation.fr: pendant qu'il beugle dans son sang et ses excréments,

translation.en: That'd be like-- Like a gift.
translation.fr: ce serait comme lui faire un cadeau.

translation.en: Hell, you'd probably get off on it.
translation.fr: Peut-être même que tu prendrais ton pied.

translation.en: Who the hell are you, anyway?
I think I'm starting to figure it out.
translation.fr: Je crois que je commence à comprendre.

translation.en: You know you're going to die up there.
translation.fr: Tu sais que tu vas y rester, là-haut.

translation.en: But I'm taking you with me.
Now isn't that a fucking picture?
Chelios, what a fucking nightmare you are.
translation.fr: Chelios, t'es un putain de cauchemar ambulant.
Je suis sûr qu'il cache un truc.

translation.en: What is this, an insulin pump? Basically.
translation.fr: - C'est une pompe à insuline ? - Plus ou moins.

translation.en: Found a new master, little bitch, is that it?
translation.fr: T'as trouvé ton maître, sale chienne ?
Je suis la chienne de personne.

translation.en: We'll see what kind of a bitch you are
translation.fr: On verra quelle chienne tu seras

translation.en: when Carlito hires you for half what he used to pay me and you take it.
translation.fr: quand Carlito te paiera moitié moins que moi.

translation.en: You'll probably throw Boss a nice little reach-around
translation.fr: Tu te mettras sûrement à quatre pattes

translation.en: just to show him what a good little bitch you are.

translation.en: You can't fucking say that! I'm nobody's little bitch!
translation.fr: Ta gueule ! Je suis la chienne de personne !

translation.en: And he'll fuckin' pay me what I tell him to pay.
translation.fr: Et il me paiera ce que je lui dirai de me payer.

translation.en: I said that's enough! Now sit down!
translation.fr: J'ai dit, ça suffit ! Maintenant, assieds-toi !

translation.en: It's been a long fucking day.
translation.fr: Ça a été une putain de longue journée.

translation.en: But, in the end, you have to admit, it all works out quite nicely.
translation.fr: Mais au final, ça se termine plutôt bien.

translation.en: Don Kim gets his bullet, thanks to you,
translation.fr: Don Kim s'est fait plomber, grâce à toi,

translation.fr: et Hong Kong a son bouc-émissaire.

translation.en: That what I think it is?
I'm afraid the Houdini act is over, my friend.

translation.en: Our father, who art in Heaven--
So this is how it is.
It's Don Kim! You're supposed to be dead!
translation.fr: Don Kim ! Tu devrais être mort.

translation.en: [Reporter] Police have moved to surround the downtown boutique Hotel Lint,
translation.fr: La police vient de quadriller l'hôtel Lint.

translation.en: where the unidentified madman behind today's mayhem
translation.fr: où le forcené à l'origine de la pagaille d'aujourd'hui

translation.en: is believed to be holed up and making a desperate last stand.
translation.fr: se serait retranché pour tenter un dernier coup d'éclat.

translation.en: Local officials have confirmed gunfire on the sun deck.
translation.fr: Des sources ont confirmé une fusillade sur la terrasse.

translation.en: Our news chopper will be bringing live,
translation.fr: Notre hélicoptère couvrira en direct les évènements

translation.en: uncensored coverage from above the hotel momentarily.
translation.fr: Notre hélicoptère couvrira en direct les évènements depuis le toit de l'hôtel.

translation.en: Again, this coverage is live and uncensored,
translation.fr: Ces images seront retransmises en direct et non censurées,

translation.en: so if you have any small children present,
translation.fr: donc si vous avez de jeunes enfants,

translation.en: you may want to have them leave the room.
Get me out of here now!
I'll kill you for this, Chelios!
Let's get the fuck out of here, now!
Now what? Now you say shit!
translation.fr: On ferme bien sa gueule, maintenant !

translation.en: You're dead! Dead! You're dead, motherfucker!
Told you I'd kill you, you little bitch!
translation.fr: J'avais dit que je finirais par te buter !

translation.en: I'm glad you called, but I'm not here.
translation.fr: Merci pour votre appel, mais je suis pas là.

translation.en: Uh, can you leave a message?
Unless you're trying to sell something, because I'm not interested.
translation.fr: Si c'est pour me vendre un truc, ça m'intéresse pas.

translation.en: But if you're not, then just…
translation.fr: Mais si c'est pas le cas, alors…

translation.en: Looks like I let you down again.
translation.fr: On dirait que je te fais encore faux bond.

translation.en: Seems like, all my life I've just been… going… going…
translation.fr: J'ai l'impression d'avoir passé ma vie à aller…

translation.en: I wish I'd taken more time to just stop and smell the roses, so to speak.
translation.fr: J'aurais voulu prendre le temps de cueillir la rose, façon de parler.

translation.en: I guess it's too late for that now.
translation.fr: Je crois que c'est un peu tard.
